mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviews (visit_id, user_id, menu_id, store_id, content, is_public, image_url, deleted_at, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{visitId}, #{userId}, #{menuId}, #{storeId}, #{content}, #{isPublic}, #{imageUrl}, NULL, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE reviews SET content = #{content}, is_public = #{isPublic}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, updated_at = now() WHERE id = #{id}
